item.title: Blue belt / 5th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Nagashizuki Basic 6: Kakato geri Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Zenshin Shiite/Joden uke/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuki Pairs Pair 1: Attacker left/Defender right Pair 2: Drop sweep (Otoshi barai)
